ayas.text: ḥā mīm
tanzīlun minar raḥmānir raḥīm
kitābun fuṣṣilat āyātuhu qur-ānan `arabiyyal liqawmiy ya`lamūn
bashīran wanadhīran fa-a`raḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasma`ūn
waqālū qulūbunā fī akinnatim mimmā tad`ūnā ilayhi wafī ādhāninā waqrun wa min bayninā wabaynika ḥijābun fa`mal innanā `āmilūn
qul innamā ana basharun mithlukum yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fastaqīmū ilayhi wastaghfirūh ۗ wawaylul lil-mushrikīn
alladhīna lā yu-tūnaz zakāta wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn
innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn
qul a-innakum latakfurūna bil ladhī khalaqal-arḍa fī yawmayni wataj`alūna lahu andādā ۚ dhālika rabbul `ālamīn
waja`ala fīhā rawāsiya min fawqihā wabāraka fīhā waqaddara fīhā aqwātahā fī arba`ati ayyāmin sawā-an lissā-ilīn
thummas-tawā ilas samā-i wahiya dukhānun faqāla lahā walil-arḍi-tiyā ṭaw`an aw karhan qālatā ataynā ṭā-i`īn
faqaḍāhunna sab`a samāwātin fī yawmayni wa-awḥā fī kulli samā-in amrahā ۚ wazayyannas samā-ad dunyā bimaṣābīḥa waḥifẓā ۚ dhālika taqdīrul `azīzil `alīm
fa-in a`raḍū faqul andhartukum ṣā`iqatan mithla ṣā`iqati `ādin wathamūd
idh jā-at humur rusulu min bayni aydīhim wa min khalfihim allā ta`budū illallāh ۖ qālū law shā-a rabbunā la-anzala malā-ikatan fa-innā bimā ursiltum bihi kāfirūn
fa-ammā `ādun fastakbarū fil-arḍi bighayril ḥaqqi waqālū man ashaddu minnā quwwah ۖ awalam yaraw annallāhal ladhī khalaqahum huwa ashaddu minhum quwwah ۖ wakānū bi-āyātinā yajḥadūn
fa-arsalnā `alayhim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī ayyāmin naḥisātin linudhīqahum `adhābal khizyi fil ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wala`adhābul-ākhirati akhzā ۖ wahum lā yunṣarūn
wa-ammā thamūdu fahadaynāhum fastaḥabbul `amā `alal-hudā fa-akhadhat-hum ṣā`iqatul `adhābil hūni bimā kānū yaksibūn
wanajjaynal ladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūn
wayawma yuḥsharu a`dā-ullāhi ilan nāri fahum yūza`ūn
ḥattā idhā mā jā-ūhā shahida `alayhim sam`uhum wa-abṣāruhum wajulūduhum bimā kānū ya`malūn
waqālū lijulūdihim lima shahidtum `alaynā ۖ qālū anṭaqanallāhul ladhī anṭaqa kulla shay-in wahuwa khalaqakum awwala marratin wa ilayhi turja`ūn
wa mā kuntum tastatirūna an yash-hada `alaykum sam`ukum walā abṣārukum walā julūdukum walākin ẓanantum annallāha lā ya`lamu kathīran mimmā ta`malūn
wadhālikum ẓannukumul ladhī ẓanantum birabbikum ardākum fa-aṣbaḥtum minal khāsirīn
fa-in yaṣbirū fan nāru mathwan lahum ۖ wa in yasta`tibū famā hum minal mu`tabīn
waqayyaḍnā lahum quranā-a fazayyanū lahum mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum waḥaqqa `alayhimul qawlu fī umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-ins ۖ innahum kānū khāsirīn
waqālal ladhīna kafarū lā tasma`ū lihādhal qur-āni wal ghaw fīhi la`allakum taghlibūn
falanudhīqannal ladhīna kafarū `adhāban shadīdan walanajziyannahum aswa-al ladhī kānū ya`malūn
dhālika jazā-u a`dā-illāhin nār ۖ lahum fīhā dārul khuld ۖ jazā-an bimā kānū bi-āyātinā yajḥadūn
waqālal ladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinal ladhayni aḍallānā minal jinni wal-insi naj`alhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā minal-asfalīn
innal ladhīna qālū rabbunallāhu thummas-taqāmū tatanazzalu `alayhimul malā-ikatu allā takhāfū walā taḥzanū wa-abshirū bil jannatil latī kuntum tū`adūn
naḥnu awliyā-ukum fil ḥayātid dunyā wafil-ākhirah ۖ walakum fīhā mā tashtahī anfusukum walakum fīhā mā tadda`ūn
nuzulan min ghafūrin raḥīm
wa man aḥsanu qawlan mimman da`ā ilallāhi wa`amila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī minal muslimīn
walā tastawil ḥasanatu walas sayyi-ah ۚ id-fa` bil latī hiya aḥsanu fa-idhal ladhī baynaka wabaynahu `adāwatun ka-annahu waliyyun ḥamīm
wa mā yulaqqāhā illal ladhīna ṣabarū wa mā yulaqqāhā illā dhū ḥaẓẓin `aẓīm
wa immā yanzaghannaka minash shayṭāni nazghun fasta`idh billāh ۖ innahu huwas samī`ul `alīm
wa min āyātihil laylu wan nahāru wash shamsu wal qamar ۚ lā tasjudū lishhamsi walā lilqamari wasjudū lillāhil ladhī khalaqahunna in kuntum iyyāhu ta`budūn
fa-inis-takbarū fal ladhīna `inda rabbika yusabbiḥūna lahu bil layli wan nahāri wahum lā yas-amūn ۩
wa min āyātihi annaka taral-arḍa khāshi`atan fa-idhā anzalnā `alayhal mā-ah-tazzat warabat ۚ innal ladhī aḥyāhā lamuḥyil mawtā ۚ innahu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
innal ladhīna yulḥidūna fī āyātinā lā yakhfawna `alaynā ۗ afaman yulqā fin nāri khayrun am man ya-tī āminan yawmal qiyāmah ۚ i'-malū mā shi-tum ۖ innahu bimā ta`malūna baṣīr
innal ladhīna kafarū bidh dhikri lammā jā-ahum ۖ wa innahu lakitābun `azīz
lā ya-tīhil bāṭilu min bayni yadayhi walā min khalfih ۖ tanzīlun min ḥakīmin ḥamīd
mā yuqālu laka illā mā qad qīla lirrusuli min qablik ۚ inna rabbaka ladhū maghfiratin wadhū `iqābin alīm

walaw ja`alnāhu qur-ānan a`jamiyyal laqālū lawlā fuṣṣilat āyātuh ۖ a-a`jamiyyun wa`arabiyy ۗ qul huwa lilladhīna āmanū hudan washifā-u ۖ wal ladhīna lā yu-minūna fī ādhānihim waqrun wahuwa `alayhim `amā ۚ ulā-ika yunādawna min makānin ba`īd
walaqad ātaynā mūsal kitāba fakhtulifa fīh ۗ walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum ۚ wa innahum lafī shakkin minhu murīb
man `amila ṣāliḥan falinafsih ۖ wa man asā-a fa`alayhā ۗ wa mā rabbuka biẓallāmin lil`abīd
ilayhi yuraddu `il-mus sā`ah ۚ wa mā takhruju min thamarātin min akmāmihā wa mā taḥmilu min unthā walā taḍa`u illā bi`il-mih ۚ wayawma yunādīhim ayna shurakā-ī qālū ādhannāka mā minnā min shahīd
waḍalla `anhum mā kānū yad`ūna min qabl ۖ waẓannū mā lahum min maḥīṣ
lā yas-amul-insānu min du`ā-il khayri wa in massahush sharru faya-ūsun qanūṭ

wala-in adhaqnāhu raḥmatan minnā min ba`di ḍarrā-a massat-hu layaqūlanna hādhā lī wa mā aẓunnus sā`ata qā-imatan wala-in ruji`tu ilā rabbī inna lī `indahu lalḥusnā ۚ falanunabbi-annal ladhīna kafarū bimā `amilū walanudhīqannahum min `adhābin ghalīẓ
wa idhā an`amnā `alal-insāni a`raḍa wana-ā bijānibihi wa idhā massahush sharru fadhū du`ā-in `arīḍ
qul ara aytum in kāna min `indillāhi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin ba`īd
sanurīhim āyātinā fil-āfāqi wafī anfusihim ḥattā yatabayyana lahum annahul ḥaqq ۗ awalam yakfi birabbika annahu `alā kulli shay-in shahīd
alā innahum fī miryatim min liqā-i rabbihim ۗ alā innahu bikulli shay-in muḥīṭ
